vote.title: Authorize Amendment No. 1 to the grant agreement with the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department for the Urban Outdoor Recreation Grant Program for the design and development of the Judge Charles R. Rose Community Park to (1) extend the term of the agreement to August 31, 2023 and (2) provide for cooperation by the City with a non-profit organization to meet the City’s obligations pursuant to the grant agreement - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
